text: The Sanamahi Kiyong () is a Meitei temple. It is built in honor of God Sanamahi of Sanamahism (Meitei religion). It is built on the top of the Selloi Langmai mountains (Nongmaiching mountains) in Imphal East district of Manipur. It was opened on the 8th of June, 2019. It is one of the most visited pilgrimage sites for the Meitei people as well as the other followers of Sanamahi religion in Manipur. ==Related pages== * Ebudhou Thangjing Temple ==References== Category:Religion in India
title: Sanamahi Kiyong Temple
